value.title: Cisco Webex aims to help you break through the language barrier
value.excerpt: Before a truly global, hybrid workforce can become a reality, language barriers first need to be eliminated which is why Cisco Webex is adding AI -powered, real-time translation to its video conferencing software.

value.title: Kaskada launches platform to prep data for AI models
value.excerpt: Kaskada, a startup developing a platform for feature engineering, has launched its platform in general availability.

value.title: Machine Learning Can Help The Insurance Industry Throughout The Process Lifecycle
value.excerpt: Not all insurance is alike. Life insurance and automobile insurance are not (as far as I know) the same thing. There are many similar processes, but data and numerous flows can be different. Machine learning (ML) is being applied to multiple aspects of insurance practice.

value.title: AWS selected as official cloud provider of PGA Tour
value.excerpt: The partnership will offer new fan experiences and engagement opportunities with features like Every Shot Live and access to historical events dating back nearly 100 years.

value.title: A new program can animate old photos. But there's nothing human about artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: Deep Nostalgia is a likely predecessor of technology that could change our reality. And our emotions make it hard to resist.

value.title: Massive Boon In Computer Chip Shortages Will Slam Future Self-Driving Car Rollouts
value.excerpt: Computer chip shortages are hurting automakers, which is exactly what will happen even in the future when self-driving cars start becoming viable, here's why.

value.title: AI ethics research conference suspends Google sponsorship
value.excerpt: The ACM Conference for Fairness, Accountability, and Transparency (FAccT) decided to pause its sponsorship relationship with Google.

value.title: Eric Schmidt-led council: America's dominance in AI is 'under threat'
value.excerpt: When it comes to holding a dominant position in the battle for artificial intelligence, the US is in danger according to a new report from The group, led by former Google CEO Eric Schmidt, filed a 756-page report this week warning that the US is at risk of falling behind other countries.

value.title: Review: A robot takes stock of humanity in Kazuo Ishiguro's timeless ‘Klara and the Sun’
value.excerpt: Klara is an Artificial Friend who observes humanity in Kazuo Ishiguro's "Klara and the Sun," his first novel since winning the Nobel Prize in 2017.

value.title: How AI is Transforming Cybersecurity in 2021?
value.excerpt: This post will let you know about the role of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in improving cybersecurity in 2021 and beyond.

value.title: Brazil’s Biggest Metro Could Get Facial Recognition Cameras That Reinforce Racist Policing
value.excerpt: Facial recognition cameras commit minimal errors in recognizing the faces of white men, but they misidentified black women up to nearly 35 percent of the time, according to a recent study.

value.title: Microsoft Ignite: How Azure Percept will bring AI to the edge for the enterprise
value.excerpt: Microsoft unveiled a preview of Azure Percept at its Ignite digital conference on Tuesday. Percept is a platform of hardware and services intended to simplify how customers use Azure artificial intelligence technologies on the edge,

value.title: Microsoft Ignite Data and Analytics roundup: Platform extensions are the key theme
value.excerpt: Microsoft is introducing a new Apache Cassandra Azure service, while adding new onramps to Azure Synapse Analytics. And it’s the first third-party cloud to cleanroom engineer its own MongoDB 4.0 API.

value.title: Microsoft launches Azure Arc machine learning and container services
value.excerpt: Microsoft unveiled two new Azure Arc services aimed at data scientists and enterprises with containerized workloads.

value.title: RBAC support is now generally available on Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: At Microsoft's Ignite 2021 conference, the company has announced a host of new capabilities now available across its Azure Cognitive Search and Azure Machine Learning solutions. Additionally, it has also announced a bunch of features currently in preview ...

value.title: From the Data and AI Expert Labs: Break open your processes
value.excerpt: Today, I want to reinforce that you shouldn’t rely on a compelling incident. You don’t need to wait until a system breaks to make it better. A great example is the Interactive Voice Response systems (IVR) that are pretty standard in customer service. We’ve all interacted with them. They’re slow, they’re

value.title: Sonantic uses AI to infuse emotion in automated speech for game prototypes
value.excerpt: Sonantic has figured out how to use AI to turn written words into spoken words in a script, and it can infuse those words with the proper emotion. And it turns out this is a pretty good way to prototype the audio storytelling in triple-A video games.

value.title: Lionbridge Completes Sale of Artificial Intelligence (AI) Division to TELUS International
value.excerpt: Lionbridge, a global leader in translation and localization solutions, today confirmed the close of the previously announced sale of its artificial intelligence division, Lionbridge AI, to TELUS International,

value.title: Who leads the world on AI? A decade from now, it might not be the US
value.excerpt: National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence fears US dominance in AI could be lost to China within 10 years due to a serious boost in investments and computing capabilities.

value.title: AWS rekindles a crafty scheme to get developers into machine learning
value.excerpt: Amazon wants to encourage more newcomers to the world of machine learning, and has given a new spin to an old idea to try and make it happen. Three years ago, the company created AWS DeepRacer, a racing competition where enthusiasts from all over the world would develop a 1/18 scale race car and power it with a machine learning model.

value.title: Artificial intelligence SPAC Goldenbridge Acquisition prices $50 million IPO
value.excerpt: Goldenbridge Acquisition, a blank check company targeting the artificial intelligence industry, raised $50 million by offering 5 million units at $10. Each unit consists of one share of common stock;

value.title: Beam raises $80 million for AI-driven dental coverage that rewards good hygiene
value.excerpt: Beam Dental, a Columbus, Ohio-based dental benefits provider, today announced it has raised $80 million in an oversubscribed series E round led by Mercato Partners. Beam says the funds will be put toward expanding its offering to new markets,

value.title: Self-driving startup Aeva hires Waymo, Apple veteran to oversee supply chain
value.excerpt: Self-driving sensor startup Aeva Inc, founded by two Apple Inc alumni, has hired another former Apple executive to oversee manufacturing and supply chain operations ahead of an expected deal to become a public company later this month.

value.title: India using facial recognition in schools is an ‘overreach’
